title: Google Issues Emergency Chrome Update to Fix Critical RCE Flaw

content.raw: Google has released an emergency security update for Chrome across all platforms, rolling out version 142.0.7444.134 and 142.0.7444.135 to address five critical and medium-severity vulnerabilities. The update addresses urgent security concerns identified in the browser’s WebGPU implementation and other core components that could expose users to remote code execution attacks.
